wikipedia_page.main: Sir David George Hanson (born 5 July 1957) is a British Labour politician who served as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Delyn from 1992 to 2019. He held several ministerial offices in the Blair and Brown governments, serving in the Home Office, Ministry of Justice, Wales Office, Northern Ireland Office and Whips' Office. Hanson sat on Ed Miliband's opposition front bench as a Shadow Treasury Minister, and later the Shadow Immigration Minister.

response: David Hanson or Dave Hanson may refer to:
* David Hanson (politician) (born 1957), British politician, MP from Delyn, Wales
* David Hanson (ice hockey) (born 1954), ice hockey player, most famous for his role in Slap Shot
* David Hanson, guitarist with progressive rock band GoodThunder
* David Hanson (robotics designer) (born 1969), American sculptor and robotics researcher
* David Hanson (computer scientist), American software engineer
